assignments.title: Math Homework - Algebra Practice
assignments.description: Solve 10 algebra problems from Chapter 3. Focus on quadratic equations and factoring.

assignments.title: Science Report - Ecosystems
assignments.description: Write a 500-word report on ecosystems. Include diagrams and references.

assignments.title: English Essay - My Favorite Book
assignments.description: Write a 300-word essay on 'My Favorite Book'. Include analysis and personal reflection.

assignments.title: History Project - Ancient Civilizations
assignments.description: Create a timeline of ancient civilizations. Include key events and figures.

assignments.title: Algebra Test Review
assignments.description: Complete review questions for the upcoming algebra test. Focus on weak areas.

assignments.title: Physics Lab Report
assignments.description: Write lab report on Newton's Laws experiment. Include calculations and graphs.
